text: The Roma District Rugby League is a competition in the Maranoa district of South West Queensland, Australia, run under the auspices of the Queensland Rugby League. ==Clubs== * Chinchilla Bulldogs * Roma Cities Gladiators * Miles Devils * Mitchell Magpies * St George Dragons * Wallumbilla-Surat Red Bulls ==Premiers== Grand Final results compiled from scores published in the Rugby
